title: Maps-to notation for functions with three arguments

blocks.name: bj-0nelmpt
blocks.content: The empty set is not an element of a function (given in maps-to notation). (Contributed by BJ, 30-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: bj-mptval
blocks.content: Value of a function given in maps-to notation. (Contributed by BJ, 30-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: bj-dfmpt2a
blocks.content: An equivalent definition of ~ df-mpo . (Contributed by BJ, 30-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-dfmpt2a(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), copab(s2, s3, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  3eqtri(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), copab(s2, s3, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2))))), coprab(s0, s1, s3, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2))), copab(s2, s3, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))))))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, s3, c0, c1, c2)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s3, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))
  opabbii(s2, s3, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2))))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))))
  bitr4i(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2))))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))), wex(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2))))))
  exbii(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))))
  3bitr2i(wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2))))), wrex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))))
  exbii(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))))
  3bitr2i(wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(s3), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))), wa(wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  anbi2i(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s3), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  ancom(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2))
  anass(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  an13(wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  df-rex(s1, c1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2))))
  r19.42v(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2)))
  df-rex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s3), c2))))
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s3), c2))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s3), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: bj-mpt2mptALT
blocks.content: Alternate proof of ~ mpt2mpt . (Contributed by BJ, 30-Dec-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-mpt2mptALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2), cmpo(s1, s2, c0, c1, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2), cmpo(s1, s2, c0, c1, c3), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), copab(s0, hs0, wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  opabbii(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  3bitr2i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))), wa(wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s1, c0, wa(wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wrex(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))
  elxp2(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  r19.41v(s1, c0, wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  rexbii(s1, c0, wa(wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  bitr3i(wa(wrex(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), wrex(s2, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  r19.41v(s2, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  rexbii(s2, c1, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  pm5.32i(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, cxp(c0, c1), c2)
  bj-dfmpt2a(s1, s2, s0, hs0, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-mpt2mptALT(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈(c0 × c1)↦ c2)=(s1 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ (s0 = < s1, s2 > → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i((s0 ∈(c0 × c1)↦ c2), (s1 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), { < s0, hs0 > |(s0 ∈(c0 × c1)∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < s0, hs0 > | ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ hs0 = c3)))})
  opabbii(s0, hs0, (s0 ∈(c0 × c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ hs0 = c3))))
  3bitr2i((s0 ∈(c0 × c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ hs0 = c3))), (∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s0 = < s1, s2 >))∧ hs0 = c2), ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(∃(s2 ∈ c1, s0 = < s1, s2 >)∧ hs0 = c2)))
  anbi1i(s0 ∈(c0 × c1), hs0 = c2, ∃(s1 ∈ c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s0 = < s1, s2 >)))
  elxp2(s1, s2, s0, c0, c1)
  r19.41v(s1, c0, ∃(s2 ∈ c1, s0 = < s1, s2 >), hs0 = c2)
  rexbii(s1, c0, (∃(s2 ∈ c1, s0 = < s1, s2 >)∧ hs0 = c2), ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ hs0 = c3)))
  bitr3i((∃(s2 ∈ c1, s0 = < s1, s2 >)∧ hs0 = c2), ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ hs0 = c3)), ∃(s2 ∈ c1,(s0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ hs0 = c2)))
  r19.41v(s2, c1, s0 = < s1, s2 >, hs0 = c2)
  rexbii(s2, c1, (s0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ hs0 = c2), (s0 = < s1, s2 > ∧ hs0 = c3))
  pm5.32i(s0 = < s1, s2 >, hs0 = c2, hs0 = c3)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c2, c3, s0 = < s1, s2 >)
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, (c0 × c1), c2)
  bj-dfmpt2a(s1, s2, s0, hs0, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 × c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

blocks.name: cmpt3
blocks.content: Extend the definition of a class to include maps-to notation for functions with three arguments.
blocks.origin: prop class cmpt3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) { (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2 ↦ c3) }

blocks.name: diff.cmpt3.s
blocks.origin:
axiom diff.cmpt3.s(setvar sBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- diffsc(sBase, cmpt3(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3))
  -| diffss(sBase, s0)
  -| diffss(sBase, s1)
  -| diffss(sBase, s2)
  -| diffsc(sBase, c0)
  -| diffsc(sBase, c1)
  -| diffsc(sBase, c2)
  -| diffsc(sBase, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom diff.cmpt3.s(setvar sBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ d(sBase,(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  ⊣ d(sBase, s0)
  ⊣ d(sBase, s1)
  ⊣ d(sBase, s2)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c0)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c1)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c2)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c3)
}

blocks.name: diff.cmpt3.c
blocks.origin:
axiom diff.cmpt3.c(class cBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- diffcc(cBase, cmpt3(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, cBase)
  -| diffsc(s1, cBase)
  -| diffsc(s2, cBase)
  -| diffcc(cBase, c0)
  -| diffcc(cBase, c1)
  -| diffcc(cBase, c2)
  -| diffcc(cBase, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom diff.cmpt3.c(class cBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ d(cBase,(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  ⊣ d(s0, cBase)
  ⊣ d(s1, cBase)
  ⊣ d(s2, cBase)
  ⊣ d(cBase, c0)
  ⊣ d(cBase, c1)
  ⊣ d(cBase, c2)
  ⊣ d(cBase, c3)
}

blocks.name: diff.cmpt3.w
blocks.origin:
axiom diff.cmpt3.w(wff wBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- diffcw(cmpt3(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3), wBase)
  -| diffsw(s0, wBase)
  -| diffsw(s1, wBase)
  -| diffsw(s2, wBase)
  -| diffcw(c0, wBase)
  -| diffcw(c1, wBase)
  -| diffcw(c2, wBase)
  -| diffcw(c3, wBase)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom diff.cmpt3.w(wff wBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ d((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), wBase)
  ⊣ d(s0, wBase)
  ⊣ d(s1, wBase)
  ⊣ d(s2, wBase)
  ⊣ d(c0, wBase)
  ⊣ d(c1, wBase)
  ⊣ d(c2, wBase)
  ⊣ d(c3, wBase)
}

blocks.name: df-bj-mpt3
blocks.content: Define maps-to notation for functions with three arguments. See ~ df-mpt and ~ df-mpo for functions with one and two arguments respectively. This definition is analogous to ~ bj-dfmpt2a . (Contributed by BJ, 11-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-bj-mpt3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cmpt3(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3), copab(s3, s4, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wa(wceq(cv(s3), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s4), c3)))))))
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s4, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-bj-mpt3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)= { < s3, s4 > | ∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2,(s3 = < s0, s1, s2 > ∧ s4 = c3))))}
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s4, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s4, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s4, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c3)
  ⊣ d(s4, c3)
}
